LOTlib.Proposals.LOTProposal module¶

class LOTlib.Proposals.LOTProposal.LOTProposal(grammar)¶

Bases: object

A class of LOT proposals. This wraps calls with copying of the hypothesis so that we can implement only propose_t classes for subclasses, that generate trees

LOTlib.Proposals.RegenerationProposal module¶

class LOTlib.Proposals.RegenerationProposal.RegenerationProposal(grammar)¶

Bases: LOTlib.Proposals.LOTProposal.LOTProposal

Propose to a tree by sampling a node at random and regenerating

propose_tree(t, separate_fb=False, predicate=<function lambdaTrue at 0x102b6d230>)¶

If separate_fb=True – return [newt, f, b], instead of [newt,f-b] NOTE: This used to copy but no longer!
